subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The men’s relay teams from France and the U.S. will have a world-championship rematch of their race at the Beijing Olympics, but the conversation around the pool is still dominated by FINA’s new suit restrictions.
snippet: The men’s relay teams from France and the U.S. will have a world-championship rematch of their race at the Beijing Olympics, but the conversation around the pool is still dominated by FINA’s new suit restrictions.
